actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two attacks, using Stone Club or Boulder in any combination.

actions.name: Stone Club
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 60/240 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.trigger: The giant is hit by a ranged attack roll and takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage from it.
reactions.response: The giant reduces the damage it takes from the attack by 11 (1d10 + 6), and if that damage is reduced to 0, the giant can redirect some of the attackâ€™s force. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the giant can see within 60 feet. Failure: 11 (1d10 + 6) Force damage.
